title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: voidIntroduction, elimination methods for solving system of nonlinear equations, symbolic techniques in modelling and simulation, symbolic and parallel adaptive methods for partial differential equations, symbolic reduction of polynomial systems, computation of rational function approximation
